gallery-debounce.name: gallery-debounce

classitems.description:
Debounces a function call so that it's only executed once after a certain
time lapse after the last time it was called
classitems.name: debounce

params.name: ms
params.description:
The number of milliseconds to debounce the function call.
Passing a -1 will disable the debounce

return.description: Returns a wrapped function that calls fn
